short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ensure Reddit always loads the default domain (not a sub domain like old.reddit.com)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
always be on www.reddit.com

Old Reddit Redirect is an extension that I use. I heard someone say the opposite would be useful for them, so I edited it to do the opposite
